name: The Nightmare Inside
storyline: After working all day you go to pick up your daughter from school. After picking her up you are heading to your house, but you are so tired and you sleep while you driving causing a car to hit you. You lose your daughter on that accident. The game starts after living again this moment in your dreams while you are sleeping, a few days after the accident.
summary: The Nightmare Inside is a first-person horror game filled with puzzles connected to an amazing story.
